name: HashesGenerator
tagline: A simple hashes generator written in VB.NET.
body:
SashaGenerator
============

![Screenshow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sn0wCooder/Icons/master/HashesGenerator_1.0.PNG)

This is a simple open source tool written in **VB.NET** that allows you to get MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384 and SHA-512 from a file.

If you want only the application, you can get it [as excutable](https://github.com/Sn0wCooder/HashesGenerator/raw/master/HashesGenerator.exe), as [ZIP file](https://github.com/Sn0wCooder/HashesGenerator/raw/master/HashesGenerator.zip) or in a [RAR archive](https://github.com/Sn0wCooder/HashesGenerator/raw/master/HashesGenerator.rar).

If you want, you can deepen [Secure Hash Algorithm](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secure_Hash_Algorithm) or [MD5](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5) on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page).

For news and updates please [follow me on Twitter](http://twitter.com/Sn0wCooder).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
